籤詩版本二:
Iindaba ezisuka elundini phayaa kunzima ukuziqonda. Ungalindeli kakhulu.
Ukuba ubunokusila ilitye kwisipili, ubuya kwazi ukuba imigudu yakho ililize.
詩意:
Le hexagram igcina umfanekiso wokuzola rhoqo.
Ukuzigcina kuwe kuyo yonke into kuya kuzisa ithamsanqa.
解曰: Zonke iintlobo zamaqhinga. Yilahleko imizamo. Kungcono ukuba ulondoloze. Siyintoni isizathu?
籤詩故事一:
◇Intombazana efuna umyeni
Ngexesha leQin Dynasty, xa uMeng Jiangnu wayengumlawuli wokuqala weQin Dynasty, ngobusuku bomtshato wakhe, umyeni wakhe uFan Qiliang (Wan Xiliang) wabanjwa waza wathunyelwa ukuba akhe uDonga Olukhulu. UMeng Jiangnu wahamba amawaka eekhilomitha esiya kuthumela umyeni wakhe iimpahla ezifudumeleyo.Kwamthatha ixesha elide ukufika kuDonga Olukhulu, kodwa ekugqibeleni waxelelwa ukuba umyeni wakhe ufile yaye umzimba wakhe ungcwatywe phantsi koDonga Olukhulu. UMeng Jiangnu walila, lwaza uDonga Olukhulu lwawa, yaye umzimba womyeni wakhe wafunyanwa unegazi elithontsiza kuloo mfumba yamathambo. UQin Shihuang ke ngoko wabiza uMeng Jiangnu, owothuke kangangokuba wafuna ukuthabatha uMeng Jiangnu njengeshweshwe lakhe. UMeng Jiangnu wacela uQin Shihuang ukuba aye kwiQinhuang Island ukuya kunika imbeko kuFan Qiliang, noQin Shihuang wavuma; emva kokuba uQin Shihuang enike imbeko. Umlandeli uQiliang, uMeng Jiangnu ubambe umzimba womyeni wakhe kwindawo yeTempile yaseMeng Jiangnu namhlanje, apho wayekhona, waziphosa elwandle kanye apho.
聖意: Ukhuseleko lwasekhaya, ukuzigcina, ubutyebi, ishishini, umtshato, ukungavisisani, ababhinqileyo abahamba ngeenyawo eLiujia, amasimi ashukumayo, iintshulube zesilika, imfuyo, ukulahlekelwa yimfuyo, ubunzima bokufumana abantu, amatyala, ilahleko, ilahleko yempahla, ukugula, izixhobo, ukuthumela Anshan bethuna, ithamsanqa
